mapper.select:
SELECT R.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT MO_NO, PLAN_PO_QTY, PLAN_WO_QTY, AMOUNT FROM (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, NVL(A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, '0') PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE NVL(TRUNC(CRT_DT), TRUNC(UPT_DT)) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO)) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO
UNION
SELECT R1.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO

SELECT SUM(PLAN_PO_QTY) SUMPO, SUM(PLAN_WO_QTY) SUMWO, NVL(SUM(AMOUNT), '0') SUMPROD, SUM(NG) SUMDFCT FROM (SELECT R.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT MO_NO, PLAN_PO_QTY, PLAN_WO_QTY, AMOUNT FROM (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, NVL(A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, '0') PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE NVL(TRUNC(CRT_DT), TRUNC(UPT_DT)) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO)) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO
UNION
SELECT R1.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO)

SELECT R3.LINE_CD, SUM(R3.PLAN_PO_QTY) JIHUA, SUM(R3.AMOUNT) CHANCHU, SUM(R3.NG) BULIANG FROM (SELECT R.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT MO_NO, PLAN_PO_QTY, PLAN_WO_QTY, AMOUNT FROM (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, NVL(A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, '0') PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE NVL(TRUNC(CRT_DT), TRUNC(UPT_DT)) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_ZZ_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO)) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO
UNION
SELECT R1.MO_NO, R1.LINE_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.ITEM_CD, R1.ITEM_NM, R1.FACE, R1.WORKINGSTATE, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.AMOUNT, NVL(NULL, '0') NG FROM (SELECT R.WO_NO, R.MO_NO, R.TOP_ITEM_CD, R.FCT_CD, R.PROD_TYPE, R.LINE_CD, R.WO_STATE, NVL((SELECT DICT_IT_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_DD_T T WHERE T.DICT_IT = 'RDI02.01'), '模拟生产中') WORKINGSTATE, NVL(R.SHIFT_CD, '无') FACE, R.WC_CD, R.ITEM_CD, R.ITEM_NM, R.ITEM_TYPE, R.MODEL_CD, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(R.PLAN_END_DT - R.PLAN_STRT_DT) * 24) TOURUWORK, R.MODEL_NM, R.UGT_TYPE, R.PLAN_STRT_DT, R.PLAN_END_DT, R.PLAN_WRK_TIME, R.PLAN_PO_QTY, R.PLAN_WO_QTY, R.CRT_DT, R.UPT_ID, R.UPT_DT, R.PROD_QTY, R.GOOD_QTY, R.DFCT_QTY, R.SCRAP_QTY, R.CAPA, R.INPUT_QTY, (SELECT PD_LN_NM FROM IPLANT1.C_IPLANT_P5_T WHERE R.LINE_CD = PD_LN_CD) LINE_NAME FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE MO_NO = NVL((SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO), (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)))) R1, (SELECT NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO) MO_NO, (SELECT R.PLAN_PO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T R WHERE R.MO_NO = NVL(A1.MO_NO, A2.MO_NO)) PLAN_PO_QTY, A1.PLAN_WO_QTY, A2.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) PLAN_WO_QTY FROM R_MES_WO_T T WHERE MO_NO = (SELECT T1.MO_NO FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(CRT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) GROUP BY T.MO_NO, T.PLAN_PO_QTY, T.PLAN_WO_QTY) A1 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT T1.MO_NO, COUNT(*) AMOUNT FROM MES1.R_MES_WIP_T T1 WHERE TRUNC(UPT_DT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND CURR_ROUT_CD = 'END' GROUP BY T1.MO_NO) A2 ON A1.MO_NO = A2.MO_NO) R WHERE R1.MO_NO = R.MO_NO) R3
GROUP BY R3.LINE_CD

SELECT A.RESULT_NG ,A.NOWDATE,COUNT(A.RESULT_NG) TEMP FROM ( SELECT S.PCBID,TRUNC(TO_DATE(S.INSPECTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24-mi-ss')) NOWDATE, CASE WHEN S.RESULT = 1 THEN 'null' WHEN S.RESULT = 2 THEN '通用' WHEN S.RESULT = 3 or S.RESULT =4 THEN 'mark' WHEN S.RESULT > 4 AND S.RESULT < 9 THEN '缺件' WHEN S.RESULT >8 AND S.RESULT < 17 THEN '偏移' WHEN S.RESULT >16 AND S.RESULT < 33 THEN '侧立' WHEN S.RESULT >32 AND S.RESULT < 65 THEN '立碑' WHEN S.RESULT >64 AND S.RESULT < 129 THEN '反贴' WHEN S.RESULT >129 AND S.RESULT < 257 THEN '错件' WHEN S.RESULT >256 AND S.RESULT < 513 THEN '极反' WHEN S.RESULT >512 AND S.RESULT < 1025THEN '缺锡' WHEN S.RESULT >1024 AND S.RESULT < 2049 THEN '多锡' WHEN S.RESULT >2048 AND S.RESULT < 4097 THEN '虚焊' WHEN S.RESULT >4096 AND S.RESULT < 8193THEN '翘脚' WHEN S.RESULT > 8192 AND S.RESULT < 16385 THEN '桥连' WHEN S.RESULT >16384 AND S.RESULT < 32769 THEN '破损' WHEN S.RESULT >32768 AND S.RESULT < 65537 THEN '刮痕' WHEN S.RESULT >65536 AND S.RESULT < 131073 THEN '凹陷' WHEN S.RESULT >131072 AND S.RESULT < 262145 THEN '多件' WHEN S.RESULT >262144 AND S.RESULT < 524289 THEN '锡珠' WHEN S.RESULT >524288 AND S.RESULT < 1048577 THEN '异物' WHEN S.RESULT > 1048576 AND S.RESULT < 2097153 THEN '漏铜' WHEN S.RESULT >2097152 AND S.RESULT < 4194305 THEN '溢胶' END RESULT_NG FROM SCADA_AOI S
WHERE TRUNC(TO_DATE(S.INSPECTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24-mi-ss')) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ) A GROUP BY A.RESULT_NG ,A.NOWDATE
